data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.3.1 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.4 PB 3
data.actual_result: The normal message menu just appears.
data.expected_result: The link popup should appear and give you the option to copy, share and open the link.
data.short_description: Copy link option missing for blocked messages
data.steps_to_repro: - Block any user or bot - Find a message from this blocked bot or user that contains a link - Hold the link to copy it
